meanings.definition: A person or thing that vocalizes.
meanings.sent1: The birds in the forest are talented vocalizers, filling the air with their beautiful songs.
meanings.sent2: The vocalizers in the choir harmonized perfectly during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The vocalizers at the zoo had a singing competition, much to the amusement of the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her pet parrot was a vocalizer like no other, mimicking every sound it heard.
meanings.sent5: The vocalizers in the opera house captivated the audience with their powerful voices.
